segments.text: I notice the boy precariously perched on a wobbly stool, reaching for cookies in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he stretches, his little fingers just grazing the edge of the jar, is both adorable and alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I canâ€™t believe he thinks he can pull this off without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for him to tip over is almost overwhelming to think about.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, but I wish he would realize the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him seems equally anxious, her palm open towards him, waiting for her sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if both of them end up in trouble if the woman turns around?
segments.speaker: PAR
